fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: The revision of regulation 1107/2009 and 396/2005 but also the revision of the Organic Agriculture. Mainly any texts (national or european) which may have consequences on biocide or plant protection markets.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: SBM Lifescience SPRL Regus Brussels Airport Pegasuslaan 5
membership:
- AFISE (http://www.afise.fr/Default.aspx?lid=1&rid=164&rvid=179) 
- UIPP (http://www.uipp.org/Qui-sommes-nous/Nos-adherents) 
- ECPA (member of the SME group, http://www.ecpa.eu/our-network) very recent membership voted in December so not yet mentioned on the website. 
- IBMA (http://www.ibma-global.org/en/all-ibma-members), member as SBM DEVELOPPEMENT 
- EBIC (http://www.biostimulants.eu/about/members/) 
- AFAIA (interprofessional association of manufacturers and dealers of fertiliser materials and growing media; members: http://www.afaia.fr/annuaire-des-adherents/?pagination=6)
goals__remit:
SBM company is a manufacturer of plant protection products for the agricultural and garden markets. SBM is also a distributor of biocide products for the general public. 
SBM develop its own solutions for the plant protection sector.
relevant_communication: This kind of activities is done by interprofessional associations of which SBM is member (UIPP, ECPA, IBMA)
